title: Massachusetts EV Charging Incentives
description: Key incentive programs for EV charging infrastructure in Massachusetts

programs.name: MOR-EV Rebate Program
programs.description: Rebates for new or used battery electric vehicles (BEVs) and plug-in hybrid electric vehicles (PHEVs)
programs.relevance_to_charging: More EVs on the road = more charging demand

programs.name: MassEVIP (Mass Electric Vehicle Incentive Program)
programs.description: Rebates for public, workplace, and multi-unit dwelling EV charging stations

programs.name: Volkswagen Environmental Mitigation Trust
programs.description: Funding for DC fast charging infrastructure along corridors and in communities

programs.name: Federal NEVI Program
programs.description: National Electric Vehicle Infrastructure Formula Program
programs.focus: Build out fast charging along designated Alternative Fuel Corridors
programs.relevance_to_charging: Federal support for high-traffic corridor locations

equity_considerations: Environmental justice community priority in state programs
